import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Context } from '../context' function ModalPicture() { const { modalActive, setModalActive, number, setNumber } = useContext(Context) const [one, setOne] = useState(true) const [two, setTwo] = useState(false) const [three, setThree] = useState(false) const [four, setFour] = useState(false) const mainPhoto = { backgroundImage: `url(../images/image-product-${number}.jpg)`, } return (
) } export { ModalPicture }
